content.question: Evidence in the excerpt can best be used to support which of the following arguments about the historical situation of South after the Civil War?

choices.label: Some elite Southerners opposed the growth of sharecropping.
Elections in the South were more democratic than in the North.
Some Southern leaders promoted industrialization as progress.
Northern politicians hindered the economic recovery of the South.

content.answer: Some Southern leaders promoted industrialization as progress.
